title: True or False (1 point each)
instructions: Select True or False for each statement.

questions.question: After a beta milestone, you should keep adding content and assets to the game until release.
Job descriptions in the game industry are not standardized. A system designer at one company could be something completely different at another.
Features are assets in the game. Things like levels, characters, weapon models, music, and VO lines.
Prototypes should always be built in the same engine as the final game.
Game Design Documents are standardized across the industry so that everyone knows what to expect.
